description: Schema definition for creating a new premium subscription for a user.

email.description: The user's email, required for creating a customer in Omise.

plan.description: The Omise plan ID for the subscription (e.g., 'plan_monthly_299').

source.description: The Omise token generated by the client-side SDK representing the payment source (e.g., Thai QR).

200_OK.description: Returns the full Omise subscription object on success.

401_Unauthorized.description: Returned if the x-auth-token is missing or invalid.

500_ServerError.description: Returned if the subscription creation fails on the Omise side.
